EmailTemplate.description: Review Cycle Has Been Terminated, Email for Notified Users of Original Distribution List
EmailTemplate.name: Review cycle Terminated - Original
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT: The Current FPR cycle of FPR {!Publication__c.Name} has been Terminated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
The current FPR cycle of FPR {!Publication__c.Name} has been terminated. You have received this email for notification purposes only. No action is required from you.
Thank you, FPR System
